column4: I'm trying to install new NV drivers, but I get an error that my X server is still running, even after I do the "gdm stop" thing from TTY. where am I going wrong?
could someone tell me why executing "gdm stop" from TTY won't kill my Xserver? I can't seem to install new gfx drivers because of it. 9.04, btw
log out of your X session
ok, what doesn't this one do?
oh. well, I wanted the new ones
because I was coerced into installing them?
my friends are on desktops and I have an acer lappie. apparently, things get done differently and I made a fool out of myself for the second time by letting them fiddle with my settings
well Hardware Drivers should work fine regardless
installing drivers manually used to interfere with it.  Not sure if that's still the case
